name: Big Eddy's Heating and Cooling
description:
(This is a chill game made for the Level Up Circle Jam. This is also my first time using the animator.)

Big Eddy's is looking for a new pilot to get planets to the right temperature. Do you like the thought of heading to distant planets? Like the thought of cooking or chilling a planet? Do you like the thought of getting payed to do that? If so, then come on down to Big Eddy's!
